statements: UPDATE PurchaseOrders SET order_quantity = 10 WHERE order_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE PurchaseOrders SET order_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE order_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174999';
UPDATE PurchaseOrders SET inventory_level = 20 WHERE order_id = '323e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174888';
UPDATE PurchaseOrders SET order_quantity = order_quantity + 5 WHERE inventory_level < 20;
UPDATE PurchaseOrders SET inventory_level = inventory_level - 1 WHERE order_date < NOW() - INTERVAL 7 DAY;
UPDATE PurchaseOrders SET order_quantity = 0 WHERE order_date < '2022-01-01';
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE purchase_order SET quantity_ordered = 20 WHERE order_id = 100;
UPDATE inventory SET unit_price = 15.99 WHERE product_name = 'Apples';
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity - 10, unit_price = unit_price * 1.1 WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE purchase_order SET quantity_ordered = quantity_ordered + 20, order_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE order_id = 201;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity + (SELECT quantity_ordered FROM purchase_order WHERE order_id = 201) WHERE id = (SELECT product_id FROM purchase_order WHERE order_id = 201);
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = quantity + 1 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Inventory SET product_name = 'New Product' WHERE id = 2;

UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = quantity * 2 WHERE product_name = 'Gadget'
